EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Eric (1323884786.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Eric (1323884786.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Eric, I know the job hunt can be tough; we have some webinars on the resources section of our website that might be helpful for you. Best of luck finding something. Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Eric Brown [mailto:ekbrown1@msn.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 12:33 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Eric Good afternoon. Unemployed since late August. Still in job searching. Sent from my BlackBerry® smartphone with Nextel Direct Connect -----Original Message----- From: Steven Arhancet Date: Wed, 14 Dec 2011 16:01:10 To: Subject: MBO Partners Eric Dear Eric, It's been some time since we last spoke with you, but I personally wanted to check in and share some news with you. We recently launched a new consultant-focused Web site which includes relevant tools such as a Bill Rate Calculator , a self-assessment tool on independence , and a video that shows how we help independents succeed in today's project economy. We encourage you to take a look. Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America . I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation . Please feel free to reply to this email and provide an update on how your contract search is going. Are you working on a project now or you currently working W2 at the moment? Steven Arhancet ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com Share your story! MBO Partner is profiling independent professionals across the country. Read their stories , or share your own . If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe
